title: Coach
body:
I was wondering if there are any coaches or high ranked player out there that could help me. I don't main any roles but i normally play bot, mid or jungle. I would like to learn some champions and how to play them and also how to control thee jungle as every game i get told of by people. If you can plz email me in game. 
IGN = NihaoCat

replies.body:
I kinda do this stuff.
Im more then happy to help other players out.
Just let me know if you just want me to go through your match history and make suggestions.
or something like this.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7XPrqvD8Lfo&list=PLyCEt27AsZuvNu0RQiCwgV2j3tR4foqvI
If you could go through my history that would be great. If you want add me in League my name is NihaoCat.

alright im so sorry, I got back and fell asleep and totally forgot I was doing stuff.
Going through your match history now.
brb on details.
Alright, I'm at "Work" so Ill go through and see what I can find in a few hours.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3RA5873_PPg

not what your looking for but might help in other aspect

If you don't find what you're looking for on the boards, take a look at [lolcoaching](http://www.lol-coaching.com/coaches.php?serverRegion=OCE&role=all&searchChampion=0&language=0&dateStart=&timeStart=&dateEnd=&timeEnd=). Really good coaches for decent prices. Some are even free!

They also run an [adopt-a-newbie program](http://www.lol-coaching.com/newbie.php) which is great for new players like yourself. Its free to join and the people are really nice and super helpful. It will probably be a bit better than the coaching option.  

Good luck  ♥
